name: Visual71
description:
We are a brand & product design studio.
Designing and supporting brands in their creation and growth stages.
 
We focus on building strong, cohesive brands that can be translated to:
sales & marketing communication strategy,
brand visual identity,
UX & UI,
websites design & development.
 
We've obtained our experience in the largest and most awarded ad agencies in Poland and Europe working for biggest brands on our planet.
 
In 2013, having 12 years of experience, we've started our own, focused on consulting & design studio and since then we transfer our experience to smaller companies with great hunger and motivation to become leaders.
 
For the past several years we've designed and released numerous websites, app interfaces as well as created visual identity of some great companies from scratch. Business consulting, customer experience and high quality design are the vital parts of what we offer our clients while supporting and developing their business strategies.
